definition: A period of time that typically occurs after a person has retired from their professional career, characterized by a state of rest, relaxation, and leisure activities. It is commonly used to refer to the phase of life when individuals enjoy their newfound freedom from work-related responsibilities and engage in personal pursuits, hobbies, and travel.

examples.german: Die Ruhestandsphase beginnt nach dem Ende der Berufstätigkeit.
examples.english: The retirement phase begins after the end of professional activity.

examples.german: Während der Ruhestandsphase können Rentenansprüche geltend gemacht werden.
examples.english: During the retirement phase, pension claims can be made.

examples.german: Die Ruhestandsphase ist eine Zeit des Ausruhens und der Entspannung.
examples.english: The retirement phase is a time for rest and relaxation.

examples.german: In der Ruhestandsphase kann man seine Hobbys und Interessen intensiver verfolgen.
examples.english: In the retirement phase, one can pursue hobbies and interests more intensively.

examples.german: Die finanzielle Absicherung in der Ruhestandsphase ist wichtig.
examples.english: Financial security in the retirement phase is important.
